text: Libor Foltman (born 11 July 1948) is a Czech skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1972 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Czechoslovakia Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1972 Winter Olympics Category:People from Trutnov
title: Libor Foltman
